link.title: Now, thanks to the efforts of THQ, wannabe mixed martial artists can experience a hard-core workout in the comfort of their own homes with "UFC Personal Trainer: The Ultimate Fitness System."

category.term: 1164~UFC Personal Trainer~Nintendo Wii~Sony PlayStation3~National Academy of Sports Medicine-approved
category.label: InformQString

content.div:
Platforms: X360, PS3, Wii

The Deal: In the age of motion controls, the fitness-crazed world has become inundated with games filled with calisthenics, yoga and Zumba -- whatever that is. Sadly, those craving a more "aggressive" workout have been forgotten, forcing them to buy overpriced DVDs or worse, travel to a gym. Now, thanks to the efforts of THQ, wannabe mixed martial artists can experience a hard-core workout in the comfort of their own homes with "UFC Personal Trainer: The Ultimate Fitness System."

More interactive exercise than game, this title offers stretches, strength training and conditioning using National Academy of Sports Medicine-approved methods. Throughout your experience, you'll develop customized workout routines that include moves from disciplines such as kickboxing, Muay Thai and wrestling. Unlike some other fitness titles, this isn't just a series of mindless workouts. Goals will be set over specific time frames as real UFC fitness trainers guide and correct your movements. It's like having your own personal trainer in your living room.

Whether you're trying to lose weight, gain muscle or improve your personal performance, "UFC Personal Trainer: The Ultimate Fitness System" offers encouragement, organized routines and reasonable goals in a perfect, motion-capturing package.
